attributes.action: Help ban dog and cat meat trade
attributes.additional_details:
Bishop Desmond Tutu said, “If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor.”

Today, we urge you to choose the side of the oppressed and take your position to help ban the barbaric and inhumane dog torture and consumption in S. Korea!
attributes.background: To know that you boil and burn dogs alive fills our children with fear. This is the message they are giving to there current and future trading partners.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to contain a clear request for action from the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a petition asking the UK Government to urge the Government of South Korea to take action, if that is what you would like to happen.
